result.arabic_text: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ
result.translation: 56. Nabii Ibraahim wonna hinnay usuk sin Rabbiiy qaranwaa kee baaxô Rabbiy ken giney qibaada cakkisita kinni, kaadu ama anu siinik axceh aniimil sumaaqitah yan marak numuk teyna kinniyo keenik iyye.
